welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Garsfontein, South Africa! Known for its charming atmosphere and vibrant culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in all this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore the wonders of Garsfontein."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport, serving flights to and from various destinations around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport, handling flights within South Africa.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport, serving flights to and from neighboring African countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, dedicated to domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a daily time limit of 2 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
